resources.string: My master, by a thousand signs, was seen as a lunatic, and I was no different, for I am more foolish than he, since I follow and serve him, if the saying is true: ‘tell me who you walk with and I will tell you who you are’ and the other one: ‘not with whom you are born, but with whom you pass through life’.
Among the greatest sins that men commit, although some say it is pride, I say it is ingratitude.
Although I know that there is no magic in the world that can move and force the will - as some simply believe - our will is free, and there is no herb or spell that can force it.

Freedom, Sancho, is one of the most precious gifts that men have received from heaven. No treasure can compare to it, neither the earth nor the sea can match it; for freedom, as for honor, one can and should risk one\'s life, and, conversely, captivity is the greatest evil that can befall men.
The more I, who was born naked, find myself naked: I neither lose nor gain.
